pullRequest.title: Fuel air munitions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implement fuel-air bombs. Looking at implementing relevant ammo for artillery pieces, but this can come out separately since it's the bulk of the work.
Includes an unrelated fix to map collection in Server.java - seems that when loading maps, the function that's recursively called to process a directory would immediately wipe out the results of its own work, preventing any maps from being displayed.

commit.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/MegaMek/megamek into fuel_air_munitions
improved bot evaluation of bomb blast radii
Merge branch 'fuel_air_munitions' of https://github.com/NickAragua/megamek into fuel_air_munitions

nodes.bodyText: Why make this a variable if it is only used once?
Fortress is a comparison to Building.Fortress, Brian's aren't implemented
Missing a space on the for (
shortName is used for display to users in contexts where the full name may be too long. It's used particularly on record sheets.
Maybe use capital letter instead of lowercase here? l, 1, I, and | can be annoying to tell the difference between them, but L is easy to tell.
Is that - after the first <data> intended?

+9986=Insufficient atmospheric pressure for fuel-air weapon. No damage inflicted.
